Complete one of the following tasks in at least 250 words.

1.    Recently you were unsuccessful at something that was important to you and your parents.  You want
      to share what you have learned from this experience with your classmates.  Write a letter to the editor
      of your school newspaper explaining why you failed, what you learned from the experience and what
      you plan to do the next time you face a similar situation.


2.    You are participating in a school debate on the motion: “Students learn better while listening to music
      or watching TV”.  Write the text of your speech, either agreeing or disagreeing with this motion.


3.    As a member of your school’s Technology Club, you have learned about a new piece of technology or
      software which you think your school needs to buy in order to improve lessons.  Write an article for
      the school magazine describing this technology/software and stating how it will benefit students.


4.    Write a diary or blog entry about the person who is your role model in life.  It should be clear what
      you admire in this person and how you would like to change yourself to be more like this person.  
      Start your entry with the words, “I wish I were more like …”.
